module.name: Conferences
module.description: Allow creation of conference rooms where multiple people can talk together
module.changelog: *12.0.10* Fixes for the below commit *12.0.9* FREEPBX-8539 Move Conference MySQL Settings to Asterisk Database *12.0.8* Allow pinless entry into conference with pins set *12.0.7* Merging everything from 2.11 into this branch *12.0.6* Merge outstanding changes from 2.11 branch *12.0.5* Add BLF feature code (*87) *12.0.4* Integrity Constraint on Insert *12.0.3* Would help to actually HAVE conferences wouldnt it. Ouch *12.0.2* Force functions to use BMO *12.0.1* BMO Module Addition *2.11.0.6* #1953 *2.11.0.5* Add BLF feature code (*87) *2.11.0.4* Update license *2.11.0.3* #6098 *2.11.0.2* Ensure object isn't duplicated *2.11.0.1* removed leftover dbug statement *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.8* #5916 *2.10.0.7* #5806 Asterisk 10 only *2.10.0.6* #5800 Asterisk 10 only *2.10.0.5* #5752 double pin request *2.10.0.4* #5664 get app_confbridge working on Asterisk 10 *2.10.0.3* #5632 *2.10.0.2* #5478 *2.10.0.1* #5451 *2.10.0.0* new version changes
